June 13, 2015 D Dutch Open (Second Division)
Dutch Open (Second Division) 20 Own Choice and Entertainments Contest Dutch Open dutch-open-second-division
Own Choice and Entertainments Contest
De Lawei, Drachten, Friesland, Netherlands Most Innovative Programme: Euphonia â€“ Wolvega Soloist Prize: Arne Schepers, Brass Band David Zwolle
Each band played a 30-minute programme, including an own-choice test-piece and a solo item.
Other own choice test-pieces were: Feeling Young (Moren), Lake of the Moon (Houben), Shine as the Light (Graham) and The Pilgrim (Walters)
May 3, 2015, 1:58 p.m. March 15, 2016, 3:26 p.m.
1 CMV Euphonia Wolvega Syde van der Ploeg Turris Fortissima
2 Constantijn Huijgens Richard Visser
3 Cologne Concert Brass Heinrich Schmidt Purcell Variations [Downie]
4 Looft den Heer Beetgumermolen Paulus de Jong
